IdeogramBrowser
Class IdeogramMarker

java.lang.Object
  IdeogramBrowser.IdeogramMarker
public class IdeogramMarker
extends java.lang.Object

An IdeogramMarker will be shown as colored lines in the Ideogram.

Author:
muellera

 int value
